product_name: Arva Starter Combo Avalanche Rescue Kit
long_description: The Starter Combo Avalanche Rescue Kit gives you the backcountry safety gear you need in 1 easy package. Included are the easy-to-use Evo 3+ Transceiver, Snow Eco Shovel and Light 240 Probe.
short_description: The Starter Combo Avalanche Rescue Kit gives you the backcountry safety gear you need in 1 easy package. Included are the easy-to-use Evo 3+ Transceiver, Snow Eco Shovel and Light 240 Probe.
